name: Lobelia erinus
details: MALIGNANT GROWTHS, extremely rapid development; colloid cancer of the omentum; cork-screw-like pains in abdomen; great dryness of skin, nasal and buccal mucous membranes; distaste for brandy; dry, eczematous patches covering points of first fingers. Malignant disease ofViolent cork-screw-like pains in abdomen.
